descriptionHtml:
This is My Skyrimized version of Utgarde Keep. This Is the complete Dungeon with all four bosses. You can find Utgarde Keep west of Whiterun. I have added a lot of new stuff in this update so I hope you enjoy it!

Required mods- Null9/Syndharo\'s: Male Cleric Armor (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12629)

Note: I have added an optional download that doesn\'t require Male Cleric Armor. It has Prince Keleseth in his old armor. 

 Update 1.0 : - Ingvar the Plunderer (final Boss for Utgarde Keep) 
                    - New Exterior!
                    - Unique Armor for Prince Keleseth
                    - Leveled Enemies (no more 25-30 lvl requirement)
                    - Enemy activity and patrols to help avoid large pulls.
                    - Fixes, cluttering, better lighting, and Optimization of whole dungeon.

I went through and fixed the navmeshes so ur follower will follow you through the whole dungeon now. Please \"MAKE A CLEAN SAVE\" when updating from 0.6 to 1.0. The new exterior does have the LOD bug where the pieces might not appear in game the first playthrough, if this happens just save your game and quit to desktop than reload your save everything Should be there. The dungeon has been fully optimized for better performance. If you find ANY BUGS please let me know so I can fix them ASAP thank you!
  


Please leave comments and tell me how you like it. If you have any ideas or dislikes please let me know. I will be making a regular and heroic version of this dungeon but i\'ll address that when the mod is complete. 

Credits: 

-Null9/Syndharo: Male Cleric Armor: (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12629) for Prince Keleseth\'s new armor.

-Nofear88: Glacern Mountain Fortress: (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11929)
author: Donker316
